body.p: I have just this moment heard that South Carolina has left the Union. I do not know what Kentucky has done, nor what she intends to do, but she cannot go wrong and I am with her heart soul and body.
When she requires my services they are at your commands.

Whilst she is in the Union I am an office in the United States Army, when she goes out please enroll my name as a private in one of the companies of the Kentucky State Guard, report me "absent with leave," order me to my post and I will obey immediately.

Very respectfully
Your Obt. Svt
Jas P. Martin
Bat. 2d Lt. 6th Infty
U. S. A.

His Excellency B. Magoffin
Gov. of Kentucky
Frankfort
KY --
Lieut Martin
